definition: Churkin (name)/Vitaly I. Churkin (1952-), Russian diplomat, Ambassador to UN from 2006
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Neither he nor Churkin mentioned the word "sanctions."
sentences.chinese: 他和丘爾金都沒有提到“制裁”一詞。
